item.description:
The Easter Bunny is coming to the McDonald's on RTE 5 from 8 a.m. - 11 a.m. There will be free gifts and photos for all the kids. No purchase and reservations needed.

Volunteers needed starting at 7:30 a.m. to help decorate, organize the kids in a line for the bunny, help them with the craft after the photo. ** No worries we already have a volunteer to dress up as the bunny** when you sign up let us know if you can join us for the whole time or just a couple hours.

Thanks!

For more information please contact Chris Sheehan through Meetup.
item.name: Breakfast with Bunny
